languages.text: "Ах этот звон! Похоже, то, как разбилось сердце несчастного палача, услышат даже на том конце Тассеры!"

traits.locale_text: "Никогда не забуду вашего доброго сердца, о величайш{mf|ий|ая} из звездных посланни{mf|ков|ц}! На эти троны я отстрою новое поместье, краше сгоревшего! И больше никакого грабежа, никогда, ни за что в жизни! Всеотцом клянусь!"

languages.text: "Oh, what clamour! I'll wager they heard the sound of the poor slaughterman's heart breaking all the way at the other end of Thassera!"
languages.original_text: "Ах этот звон! Похоже, то, как разбилось сердце несчастного палача, услышат даже на том конце Тассеры!"

traits.locale_text: "Oh, what clamour! The sound of the poor slaughterman's heart breaking will be heard even at the far end of Thassera!"
"Oh, what clamour! The sound of the poor slaughterman's heart breaking will be heard even at the far end of Thassera!"
"Oh, what clamour! The sound of the poor slaughterman's heart breaking will be heard even at the far ends of Thassera!"
"Oh, what clamour! The sound of the poor slaughterman's heart breaking will be heard even at the far ends of Thassera!"
"Oh, what clamour! I'll wager they heard the sound of the poor slaughterman's heart breaking all the way at the other end of Thassera!"
"Oh, what clamour! I'll wager they heard the sound of the poor slaughterman's heart breaking all the way at the other end of Thassera!"

languages.text: “噢，何等喧嚣！我敢打赌，即便是在塔瑟拉的另一端，人们也能听到这位可怜的屠夫心碎的声音！”
languages.original_text: "Oh, what clamour! I'll wager they heard the sound of the poor slaughterman's heart breaking all the way at the other end of Thassera!"

traits.locale_text: “噢，何等喧嚣！我敢打赌，即便是在塔瑟拉的另一端，人们也能听到这位可怜的屠夫心碎的声音！”

languages.text: «¡Oh, menuda escandalera! ¡Seguro que el ruido del corazón del pobre verdugo al partirse se ha oído hasta en la otra punta de Thassera!».
languages.original_text: "Oh, what clamour! I'll wager they heard the sound of the poor slaughterman's heart breaking all the way at the other end of Thassera!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Oh, menuda escandalera! ¡Seguro que el ruido del corazón del pobre verdugo al partirse se ha oído hasta en la otra punta de Thassera!».

languages.text: "Feryat gibi feryat! Bahse varım zavallı celladın kalbinin kırılma sesini Thassera'nın diğer ucundan bile duymuşlardır!"
languages.original_text: "Oh, what clamour! I'll wager they heard the sound of the poor slaughterman's heart breaking all the way at the other end of Thassera!"

traits.locale_text: "Feryat gibi feryat! Bahse varım zavallı celladın kalbinin kırılma sesini Thassera'nın diğer ucundan bile duymuşlardır!"

languages.text: 「あぁ、なんという抗議の叫びだ！可哀想な死刑執行人の落胆の音が遙々タッセーラの反対側まで聞こえたに違いない！」
languages.original_text: "Oh, what clamour! I'll wager they heard the sound of the poor slaughterman's heart breaking all the way at the other end of Thassera!"

traits.locale_text: 「あぁ、なんという抗議の叫びだ！可哀想な死刑執行人の落胆の音が遙々タッセーラの反対側まで聞こえたに違いない！」

languages.text: « Quel fracas ! Je parie que le bruit émis par le cœur de notre infortuné bourreau en se brisant a résonné jusqu'à l'autre bout de la planète ! »
languages.original_text: "Oh, what clamour! I'll wager they heard the sound of the poor slaughterman's heart breaking all the way at the other end of Thassera!"

traits.locale_text: « Quel fracas ! Je parie que le bruit émis par le cœur de notre infortuné bourreau en se brisant a résonné jusqu'à l'autre bout de la planète ! »

languages.text: "Ach, was für ein Getöse! Bestimmt hat man noch am anderen Ende von Thassera das Herz des armen Schlächters brechen hören!"
languages.original_text: "Oh, what clamour! I'll wager they heard the sound of the poor slaughterman's heart breaking all the way at the other end of Thassera!"

traits.locale_text: "Ach, was für ein Getöse! Bestimmt hat man noch am anderen Ende von Thassera das Herz des armen Schlächters brechen hören!"
